text: Trump to announce up to $500 billion in private sector AI infrastructure investment Start doing due diligence on AI infrastructure stocks. There will be many benefitting from this. (large caps and small caps). AI infrastructure needs to be upgraded, energy grids need to be updated to be able to keep up with artificial intelligence.
label: good

text: Microsoft's $80B AI Bet: Data Center Expansion Fuels Nvidia and AMD Surge Microsoft (MSFT) plans to invest $80 billion in data centers this year to power AI infrastructure, as revealed by VP Brad Smith. The spending will primarily support AI innovation, with partnerships like OpenAI, Anthropic, and xAI. Despite the bold move, MSFT shares fell 1.3%, but Nvidia (NVDA) and AMD (AMD) surged 4% and 3%, respectively, as they supply the GPUs essential for AI-driven data centers. This highlights the growing demand for AI compute power and Microsoft's aggressive cloud expansion.
label: good
